lead_paragraph: A Florida-based sports marketing consultant from Colombia pleaded guilty in a U.S. court on Tuesday as part of an investigation of corruption in world soccer's governing body FIFA, saying he had schemed to bribe various officials in the sport.

headline.print_headline: Florida Soccer Consultant Pleads Guilty in FIFA Probe
headline.main: Florida Soccer Consultant Pleads Guilty in FIFA Probe
